'''''Mythlore'' 67''' ([https://dc.swosu.edu/mythlore/vol18/iss1/ Volume 18, Issue 1]) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].

==Contents==

====Articles====

* Langford, Jonathon D. “The Scouring of the Shire as a Hobbit Coming-of-Age.”
* Patterson, Nancy-Lou. “Always Winter and Never Christmas: Symbols of Time in Lewis' Chronicles of Narnia.”
* Frontgia, Terri. “Archetypes, Stereotypes, and The Female Hero: Transformations in Contemporary Perspectives.”
* Arthur, Elizabeth. “Above All Shadows Rides the Sun: Gollum as Hero.”
* Byfield, Bruce. “The Secret Queen: Two Views of the Heroine in Diana Paxson's ''The White Raven''.”
* DiSante, Paula, Sarah Beach, and Nancy-Lou Patterson. “Artists' Comments on Their Art.”
* Beach, Sarah. “Fire and Ice: The Traditional Heroine in ''The Silmarillion''.”
* Seeman, Chris. “Tolkien and Campbell Compared.”
* Grebe, Coralee. “Bashing Joseph Campbell: Is He Now the Hero of a Thousand Spaces?”
* Filmer, Kath. “Religion and Romanticism in Michael Ende's ''The Neverending Story''.”

====Features====

* GoodKnight, Glen H. Editorial Introduction: In This Issue.
* Christopher, Joe R., and Wayne G. Hammond. An Inklings Bibliography (44).
* Kondratiev, Alexei. “Tales Newly Told.”
* Letters.

====Reviews====

* ''The Lion, the Witch, and the Wardrobe''. C.S. Lewis, Illus. by Pauline Baynes. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''The Magical World of the Inklings: J.R.R. Tolkien, C.S. Lewis, Charles Williams, Owen Barfield''. "Gareth Knight". Reviewed by David Llewellyn Dobbs.
* ''Celtic Calendar 1992: an historical and mythological calendar representing the Celtic Year: November 1, 1991 to October 31, 1992''. Patrick Wynne and Alexei Kondratiev. Reviewed by Glen GoodKnight.
